body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**: BUG REPORT

/kind bug

**What happened**: If someone requests a zero (0) capacity PVC and an administrator creates a zero (0) capacity PV, Kubernetes will happily bind them together. Unfortunately, any use of this PVC/PV combination by a pod will fail. It fails because the zero capacity PV cannot be formatted or mounted successfully.

Note: The same issue happens for dynamically provisioned PVs.

**What you expected to happen**: I expect that Kubernetes would not allow creation of invalid PVC and PV objects, aka zero (0) capacity PVs and PVCs.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**: Create a pod that requests a zero capacity PVC, using dynamic PV provisioning is simpler than creating your own zero (0) capacity PV. The pod will fail to reach a running state, since the related PV fails to be formatted and mounted successfully.

Here is the error that I received for a test I performed requesting a zero capacity PVC using ceph rbd:
```
FailedMountUnable to mount volumes for pod "<SNIP-statefulset-app-0>(f7493a4d-8799-11e7-9cda-1418774b3e9d)": timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach/mount for pod "<SNIP-statefulset-app-0>". list of unattached/unmounted volumes=[www]
  
FailedSyncError syncing pod, skipping: timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach/mount for pod "<SNIP-statefulset-app-0>". list of unattached/unmounted volumes=[www]

FailedMountMountVolume.SetUp failed for volume "kubernetes.io/rbd/f7493a4d-8799-11e7-9cda-1418774b3e9d-pvc-f74584d5-8799-11e7-9cda-1418774b3e9d" (spec.Name: "pvc-f74584d5-8799-11e7-9cda-1418774b3e9d") pod "f7493a4d-8799-11e7-9cda-1418774b3e9d" (UID: "f7493a4d-8799-11e7-9cda-1418774b3e9d") with: rbd: failed to mount rbd volume /dev/rbd3 [] to /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/rbd/rbd/rbd-image-kubernetes-dynamic-pvc-f74b872e-8799-11e7-9704-14187746a5f7, error mount failed: exit status 32
Mounting command: mount
Mounting arguments: /dev/rbd3 /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/rbd/rbd/rbd-image-kubernetes-dynamic-pvc-f74b872e-8799-11e7-9704-14187746a5f7  [defaults]
Output: mount: /dev/rbd3: can't read superblock
```

**Anything else we need to know?**:

Here is a related item with a specific fix for external ceph rbd provisioner: https://github.com/kubernetes-incubator/external-storage/pull/272

**Environment**:
- Nothing specific to environment

title: Zero capacity PVs cause pods to fail and zero capacity PVCs create zero capacity PVs
